results.title: Lisinopril for the treatment of hypertension within the first 24 hours of acute ischemic stroke and follow-up.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Forty @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ (systolic blood pressure [BP] >/=140 or diastolic BP >/=90 mm Hg) @DISEASE_Ischemic_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D000083242 @@@acute ischemic stroke@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (14 @<m>DISEASE_Stroke_Lacunar</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D059409 @@@lacunar@@@, 13 partial anterior, 7 total anterior, 6 posterior circulation @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarct@@@) were randomized to 5 mg of oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (n = 18) or matching placebo (n = 22).

citations.NLM: Eveson DJ, Robinson TG, Potter JF. Lisinopril for the treatment of hypertension within the first 24 hours of acute ischemic stroke and follow-up. Am J Hypertens. 2007 Mar;20(3):270-7. PMID: 17324738
